meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with open shelves for displaying ornaments or other items.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's etageres in the living room are filled with beautiful figurines.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new etageres to showcase my collection of vintage teacups.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the etageres were a fun climbing structure, much to my dismay.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an etageres, neatly organizing memories and thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window illuminated the etageres, making them look even more elegant.

meanings.definition: A set of shelves for holding books or other objects.
meanings.sent1: The library had a wide selection of etageres filled with books of all genres.
meanings.sent2: I rearranged the etageres in my study to make room for my new art supplies.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of the etageres, much to the audience's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like books on an etageres, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The antique etageres in the bookstore added a touch of charm to the cozy atmosphere.
